On October 30, 2025, members of CSDisseminate were featured in a [Center for Open Science](https://www.cos.io/) blog post highlighting our recent preprint, **“There’s going to have to be a culture shift”: Associate and full professors’ perceptions and experiences related to open science practices in communication sciences and disorders**.

The post showcases how preprints are helping advance transparency and collaboration in our field.

[Click here to read the blog post!](https://www.cos.io/blog/preprints-in-action-advancing-open-science-across-communication-sciences-and-disorders){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn role="button" data-toggle="button"}
